- Dogs and cats are welcome!
Non-refundable fee of $250 for 1st pet and $350 for a 2nd pet.
Monthly pet rent is $25/mo/pet.

- Ask me about other floor plans available in the building.
The North Hotel is located at California & North Aves which provides great access for all that Humboldt Park, Logan Square, and Wicker Park have to offer.
Newly renovated studio apartments have plenty of built-in conveniences with in-unit washer/dryers, plus free WiFi.
Lobby
Take a breather or gain some knowledge, grab a book from the bookshelf or bring your own.
The co-working table, Wi-fi, and natural light will inspire your work.
Bike Room
Just blocks from the 606 bike trail, you’ll have a secure place to stow your bike when you get home.
Humboldt Park
This expansive park offers plenty of recreation with a historic field house that is home to a fitness center, gymnasium, and meeting rooms.
The lagoons and boat house are a favorite spot among the community in the summer.
The park is also home to the National Museum of Puerto Rican Arts and Culture.
606 Trail
The 606 is a converted rail line into a 2.7-mile bike trail and run/walk path.
You can access the trail on California avenue, head East or West, and stop to enjoy the scenery and art installations along the way.
Michael Richman
North Star Real Estate Group
